attributes.action: We ask the government to reconsider the offer of 1% pay rise to our NHS staff.
attributes.additional_details: Whatever it takes was the mantra of the government but time and time again they have let us down. To offer the NHS this slap in the face after all they have done, is an insult.
attributes.background: The NHS has been on the frontline of the covid pandemic, putting their lives at risk and losing many of their colleagues. The offer of 1% payrise is an insult and should be reviewed.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253
